ingredients.ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package low-fat cream cheese, softened
2 tablespoons minced sweet onion (such as Vidalia®)
2 tablespoons capers - rinsed, drained, and chopped
1 teaspoon reduced-sodium seafood seasoning (such as Old Bay®)
3 drops hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®), or more to taste

cookingTips: Soften cream cheese at room temperature for smooth mixing
Balance flavors: capers and hot sauce provide acidity and heat against rich cream cheese
Spread can be made ahead and refrigerated for 1-2 days
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This appetizer dip combines tuna protein with bold, briny flavors. Guide the cook to fold ingredients gently and taste carefully to balance Old Bay's spice against the cream cheese richness.
